headline: Sygnia Expands Cyber Insurance Expertise with Global Risk and Insurance Leader Elissa Doroff
summary: TEL AVIV & NEW YORK, July 09, 2025--Sygnia, the foremost global cyber readiness & response team, has added Elissa Doroff as its Director of Cyber Insurance and Legal Partnerships.

raw.headline: Sygnia Expands Cyber Insurance Expertise with Global Risk and Insurance Leader Elissa Doroff

headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From AIG’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: AIG’s first-quarter results were met with a positive market reaction as the company delivered non-GAAP profit well above Wall Street’s expectations despite missing on revenue. Management attributed this outcome to disciplined underwriting, expense control, and growth in its commercial insurance segments. CEO Peter Zaffino pointed to robust premium growth in North America Commercial Insurance and operational improvements, especially in expense ratios. The company also highlighted the benefit from
